rows.label: tev001711_MSG0010
rows.name:
I've heard everything.
Our fight isn't over, is it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001711_MSG0020
rows.name:
The people of NLA must be feeling so lost
and uncertain right now. I have to step up
and be there for everyone...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001711_MSG0050
rows.name:
Yes, of course. I'm at your disposal.
I want to help in whatever way I can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001711_MSG0080
rows.name:
Okay. I'll take care of everything
and everyone inside NLA.
And...you stay safe too...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001711_MSG0100
rows.name:
Oh...you came looking for me?
I'm really sorry that I've caused you
such trouble.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001711_MSG0110
rows.name:
I pray that the others made it as well...
We need to find them and make sure
they're safe, as quick as we can![ST:wait ]
